body: Hi Mostapha, my mistake, it is not because of the update but of the type of input you use. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/a3LBUr4VfNHgUc-p1UkaLs4oj79PPAdhQEBAA3g5ix*OKWzvxT5QLpzD7kKdSzP7JM2DmoArX5HyKIr6PDfqxriHQoUz0TkI/HDM_input.png) by making a list of 24 hours. or [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/a3LBUr4VfNFLwfb4FO4*fK5qkMz6oiIwaZgMVfFDEgwlytYH1EaMl6XC34Y1U8ZNusL8NiLvz6OmWZPlG5RXQ*u4pcL20muC/AnalysisPeriod_input.png) Best Antonello
